languages.text: {n}Испепелив Астарцию взглядом, сенешаль нехотя отвечает:{/n} "Затруднюсь ответить насчет яиц... Но да, определенно был. И теперь лучше понимаю, за что так часто получал ремня".

{n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."
languages.original_text: {n}Испепелив Астарцию взглядом, сенешаль нехотя отвечает:{/n} "Затруднюсь ответить насчет яиц... Но да, определенно был. И теперь лучше понимаю, за что так часто получал ремня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly:{/n} "I'm afraid I could not tell you about that last part. As for your general point — yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently punished."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly:{/n} "I'm afraid I could not tell you about that last part. As for your general point — yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently punished."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはアスタルチアをにらみつけてから、仕方なく答える。{/n}「あいにく、最後の部分についてはお答えできません。一般論を言うなら、はい、確かにそんなこともありました。今なら、そこまで頻繁に酒を飲んでいた理由もまあわかります」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはアスタルチアをにらみつけてから、仕方なく答える。{/n}「あいにく、最後の部分についてはお答えできません。一般論を言うなら、はい、確かにそんなこともありました。今なら、そこまで頻繁に酒を飲んでいた理由もまあわかります」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德瞪了艾丝塔西娅一眼，这才不情不愿地开了口。{/n}“恐怕我无法回答最后那个问题。但总体来说，你说得没错。我现在有点明白，为什么我小时候总会挨皮带抽了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德瞪了艾丝塔西娅一眼，这才不情不愿地开了口。{/n}“我无法回答最后那个问题。但总体来说，你说得没错。我现在有点明白，为什么我小时候总会挨皮带抽了。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard lance un regard noir à Astartia avant de répondre avec quelque réticence :{/n} « Pour ce qui concerne votre dernière remarque, je ne saurais dire. En revanche, je peux confirmer que oui, j'étais comme ça dans ma jeunesse. Je comprends mieux à présent pourquoi j'ai pris autant de coups de ceinture. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard lance un regard noir à Astartia avant de répondre avec quelque réticence :{/n} « Pour ce qui concerne votre dernière remarque, je ne saurais dire. En revanche, je peux confirmer que oui, j'étais comme ça dans ma jeunesse. Je comprends mieux à présent pourquoi j'ai pris autant de coups de ceinture. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard mira fijamente a Astartia antes de responder de mala gana:{/n} «Me temo que no tengo respuesta para la última parte. En cuanto a su pregunta principal, sí, lo era, y ahora entiendo por qué me pegaban con tanta frecuencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard mira fijamente a Astartia antes de responder de mala gana:{/n} «Me temo que no tengo respuesta para la última parte. En cuanto a su pregunta principal, sí, lo era, y ahora entiendo por qué me pegaban con tanta frecuencia».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard starrt Astartia an, ehe er zögerlich antwortet:{/n} "Ich fürchte, was den letzten Punkt angeht, kann ich nicht antworten. Und was Eure allgemeine Frage angeht: Ja, gewiss. Und nun verstehe ich auch besser, warum ich so oft mit dem Gürtel geschlagen wurde."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard starrt Astartia an, ehe er zögerlich antwortet:{/n} "Ich fürchte, zu Letzterem kann ich Euch nichts sagen. Und was Eure allgemeine Frage angeht: Ja, gewiss. Und nun verstehe ich auch besser, warum ich so oft mit dem Gürtel geschlagen wurde."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, ürkekçe cevap vermeden evvel Astartia'ya bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Son dediğine bir şey diyemeyeceğim. Fakat evet, öyleydim. Şimdiyse gençliğimde o kadar dayağı neden yediğimi daha iyi anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard glares at Astartia before responding reluctantly,{/n} "I'm afraid I cannot answer you on that last part. As for your general point, yes, I certainly was. And now I better understand why I was so frequently belted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, ürkekçe cevap vermeden evvel Astartia'ya bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Son kısma bir şey diyemeyeceğim. Ama evet, öyleydim. Şimdiyse gençliğimde o kadar dayağı neden yediğimi daha iyi anlıyorum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
